Home.title: Create your GDPR-compliant ROPA files with ease.
Home.cardContent1: ROPAgen uses advanced AI algorithms to generate your ROPA files quickly and accurately.
Home.cardContent2: ROPAgen ensures that your ROPA files meet all GDPR requirements, so you can focus on your business.
Home.cardContent3: With a user-friendly interface, ROPAgen makes it simple to create and manage your ROPA files. It even offers templates to get you started quickly.

tooltips.info: Enter the title and basic information for your ROPA document. This helps identify the specific processing activity you're documenting.
tooltips.organization: Provide details about your organization including name, contact information, role (controller/processor), legal representative, and Data Protection Officer contact information.
tooltips.purposeOfDataProcessing: Describe why you process personal data. This should explain the specific purposes and objectives of the data processing activity, such as employee administration or customer management.
tooltips.technicalOrganizationalMeasures: Document the security measures in place to protect personal data. Include technical safeguards (encryption, access controls) and organizational measures (staff training, policies).
tooltips.legalBasis: Select the legal grounds that justify your data processing under GDPR Article 6. You can choose multiple bases such as consent, contract fulfillment, or legitimate interests.
tooltips.dataSources: Identify where you collect or obtain the personal data from. This includes software systems, platforms, databases, and any external sources used in your processing activities.
tooltips.dataCategories: Specify what types of personal data you process. Categorize data into groups like personal information, employment records, financial data, health data, or behavioral information.
tooltips.personCategories: Define who the data subjects are and who has access to their data. Include affected persons, internal recipients, external recipients, and authorized personnel who process the data.
tooltips.retentionPeriods: Specify how long you keep personal data before deletion. Define retention periods based on legal requirements, business needs, or until consent is withdrawn.
tooltips.additionalInfo: Add any extra information relevant to this processing activity, such as special security measures, third-party processors, international data transfers, or specific compliance notes.
tooltips.generateDocument: Choose your AI model and generate the final ROPA document. The system will compile all provided information into a comprehensive, GDPR-compliant record of processing activities.
